website_summaries.verdict: A quiet inverter with power up to 500 watts that runs most small appliances with ease, though its behavior is erratic at low voltage.
pros: Digital feedback on voltage output is a nice plus
Runs quietly, usually not needing its fan below 150 watts of usage
Compact and easy to hook up
Powers small appliances and other devices easily
cons: Shuts off if battery drops below 10-12 volts
Fuse must be replaced any time it exceeds wattage ratings
Digital readout may not report actual output

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I own a 12v refrigerator, but the refrigerator turns off at 12.4 volts. Thats good if you are operating off your starter battery, but I'm not. The Potek runs a 12v power supply and will operate until the battery voltage goes to 11v. This keeps the refrigerator running all night. The fan only turns on when it gets too hot. It is silent mostly, and I'm not interested in sleeping next to a vacuum cleaner, like some of those other inverters. I bought 2 500 watt inverters already. One for my boat. One for my van. I'm buying a 750 watt for my home refrigerator. I wouldn't buy 3 if I didn't love 1.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Power
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stay connected on a road trip because cigarette lighter portals are useless when it comes to keeping things charged. The power inverter was what I needed. Used it for the laptop without issues and charged all the kids mobile devices too. On my SUV there is a rear port at the back of the armrest console and I plugged it in there and kept it on the ground under the seat. Didn't get too hot and was accessible to the kids the whole road trip. This is pretty much a must (especially during the pandemic) because it accelerated the charge rate of all the devices.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMark

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time. If you short circuit or have a reverse current it shorts out as could be expected. They provide a couple fuses to replace the one that shorted but guess what? You can't open the thing up with normal tools to replace the fuse yourself. The manual states "Contact a qualified service technician to replace the fuse(s) with the appropriate replacements(s)." BTW, if you try to call their support number you will get a message that the person is offline. What a POS!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Poland

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice Product and high quality! I bought this item for my family car trip next month.Before the trip,I had used it many times and I am quite satisfied with it.My kids like to watch movies on their tablet while I am driving.Also,I can charge my laptop and smart phone for emergencies with no issue. Having the inverter for your car which has enough wattage to run your essentials.I am really pleased with the excellent quality.Today I found my little drill in the storeroom and tested if the inverter can run the 650W drill.Succeeded and fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Da Feiyang

customer_reviews.title: I'm not certain this thing even works.
customer_reviews.text: The attaching posts on this are short and skinny, and there's no hole in the post like there would be on speaker posts. So, a bare wire wants to slip off the inverter. I will have to buy crimps and crimping tool. Also, even though it's hooked up, I cannot get inverter to turn on for more than a half-second at a time. The wire that comes to attach in your car does have crimps in it; no issue there. However, I want to use it on my boat with other wires attached through a charge controller.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander S. Newberry

customer_reviews.title: You must turn it on EVERY time
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to put it in my trunk to charge my EV scooter. Guess what, if the car is off, it turns off and you'll have to turn it back on. Second issue: even without a load, it consumes 500mA at 13V. That is wasted power I like the display, and the 5 v outlet, but won't work for my purpose Will return
customer_reviews.author: Jean Le Lupi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for road trips where I am the passenger. Last time I was able to work on my school paper using my laptop which the battery doesn't hold it turned on without being plugged. Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Dragone

customer_reviews.title: An amazing $40 investment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 years ago and had intended to use it to charge some of my devices during power outages. However one time I just left it plugged into my homes backup batteries and left my network/phone system hooked into it. It’s been well over two years since I left it hooked up and it’s been working perfectly ever since. Consistently keeping my home network and communications working. Very helpful during all these PG&E power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Levenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Item!
customer_reviews.text: Great Item Very Useful The digital screen gives you the Battery Charge in Volts ,the volts of the batterry and how many watts are use Great to check battery Charge while in use so you can unplug when it reaches 12.0v after it gets lower and the battery would drain fast Plugging the alligator clips wrong will blow the fuse and opening is a little bit sketchy at first it has spare fuses
customer_reviews.author: WaveSurf

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee  ain’t makin’ no joe with this inverter
customer_reviews.text: This inverter does the job perfectly without a hitch. I purchased it for camping trips, etc... but it sure came in handy last week when our power went out at home for a few hours. A transformer needed attention so while the power company dis thier job, this Potek inverter did it's job and provided light, a fan to cool us, and a charging port fir each of our cell phones. I highly recommend this inverter! It WILL do the job!
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Inverter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use when traveling on the road so that I could "work remotely". I have been able to plug in multiple things, 3yr old laptop, phone (via outlet and USB), aircard via USB all at the same time without any issue, just using the 12V adapter. Not seen anything even push towards 200. I do like that it will automatically turn off if the vehicle is off after a certain amount of time. Would be nice if they included velcro strips for easy mounting in the vehicle (so that it doesn't slide around when turning, but, can be removed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: islander79

customer_reviews.title: Crazy looking waveform on oscilloscope but it works
customer_reviews.text: Won't plug anything valuable into the sockets, but it works for basic things like chargers, lights, fan.
customer_reviews.author: edward D.

customer_reviews.title: Great power inverter simple and easy to use. Powers 42 in tv for 5 hours.
customer_reviews.text: We clamp this power pack on a 12 volt car battery that's been charged outside to run our 42-inch Toshiba TV in our camper after generator hours. It is so simple to use and that's why I bought it my wife is the one who connects and disconnects it well she is work camping at a campground in northern Wisconsin. Very simple to connect and disconnect turn on and turn off and it's safe from my electronic devices. I recommend this power inverter. Thank you p o t e k.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Why be without one ?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in preparation of an Alaskan trip where I'd be tent camping from a rental car. My CPAP for sleep apnea was my big concern. 2 1/2 weeks without it was not a good option. This inverter worked GREAT where I parked close enough to reach the battery with the supply cord. I'd switch to the plug-in charger during the day to keep my electronics powered up. I've told a bunch of family and friends about it since I got back. I'd definitely recommend this for lite duty field power. Having 2 each of 110 and USB outlets is a smart design option to boot!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Edit: Transforms adequately, solid build, convenient meter
customer_reviews.text: Upon unscrewing the battery connection terminals to use the provided alligator clips, the positive post unscrewed in its entirety from the unit. There are now pieces rattling around inside I can only assume were used to secure the terminal post from the inside. Energizing the device at this point is unwise. EDIT: After contacting Potek I was informed that opening the unit only required removing the 4 visible screws. I'm used to devices hiding screws under stickers, rubber feet, and even sonic welds. I reattched the lock-washer and nut firmly and resealed the unit. Unsure if doing this voided any warranty, but apart from this mechanical failure I feel this unit will live a good long life.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: NOT for people with RVs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item because it states that it is great for camping. There is NO manual override for the low voltage beeping/indicator. We purchased this to use off of a deep cycle battery to power our TV in our RV so that we didn't have to run the generator. It started beeping after the battery got down to 10.5 volts and it powered down the TV (within a few minutes). The TV is an extremely low watt TV. It was not the product we were looking for. Rv-ers beware. Find a product that allows the deep-cycle to drain all of the way, and not just a tiny amount.
customer_reviews.author: Spiers

customer_reviews.title: Great Product / Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Great Little unit, I actually purchased the wrong one but customer support which is top notch helped in such a way that all my power inverter future needs will be met by Potek. The unit I kept is well put together easy to connect and instructions that are easy to follow. I strongly suggest you do your math on wattage and amps needs and even if you've purchased the wrong one customer support is more than happy to help. Thanks to the team at Potek...
customer_reviews.author: Frank Guerrero Jr

customer_reviews.title: Hold the button to start.
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought I had received an inoperable unit. Checked the incoming 12vdc power, it was correct and the unit would not turn on.i posted a review complaining. I was quickly contacted by Potek asking how long i had held down the button to start the unit. I thought i had held it long enough, but decided to give it a second try. Douh, obviously not long enough. It works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Rod K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wattage
customer_reviews.text: This inverter is great. I live in the Northern Mariana Islands where we experienced the worst catastrophic storm to hit U.S soil. 220 mile an hour gusts. We are still without power. We have a 3500 watt generator that we run about 10 hours a day off and on. When the generator is on I connect a battery charger to a deep cell battery. At night the inverter is connected to the to the deep cycle battery and powers a fan, two small night lights and chargers for cell phones. The fan runs for ten hours easily. Andy
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Solberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, does its job perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheapo 150W inverter that had the fan running all the time. This one fan won't come on unless under much heavier load. QUIET, perfect for using the laptop off the camper deep cycle batteries. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: James Fallon

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I bought this inverter work like a pro
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought this inverter work like a pro... I am from PR no electricity and I connect,my TV,DVD,Fan cell phones etc and only use 80 watts ..loving it... purchased this in November, and before give a good review wanted to tested before ....
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Load
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to run my home Fiber Optic fixed adapter and router from a car battery for backup. The load is usually 32 Watts but does spike over 100 Watts occasionally. I used the cigarette lighter cable.
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth it.... Wasn’t expecting to receive it fast as i did. Charges quick for my MacBook, battery for my Canon camera and other things I need that doesn’t use a car charger. It’s not big and bulky. Pretty much a good size. I have indicated photos as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile inverter
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit. Can't beat the price for a 500w inverter that has a temperature controlled fan, battery clamps and extra fuses. I bought this to replace a 300w unit that wouldn't start a shop light in my solar powered shed. Works perfectly and the 3 position readout is pretty handy, especially for wattage used.
customer_reviews.author: John Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Replaceable fuses
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a few inverters. The main problem with some has been that, if over loaded or shorted, they're burned out and have no fuse protection. This one does. Input and output on the little screen is helpful to know it's functioning correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Flyinglow

customer_reviews.title: A few went out after a few months of use and the rest don't charge like they used to
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 for my fleet of vehicles at work. A few went out after a few months of use and the rest don't charge like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Unit !
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my r/v on the kitchen counter. Charges phones and devices nicely. Runs a tv and laptop no problem. Great for when out boon-docking and need a charge. Hard wired it to the main r/v house battery. I also added a small 20w solar panel on the roof to keep the battery top up during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona / Montana Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product, I’m very satisfied with it. Works just as expected if not better. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a power converting unit for the rig
customer_reviews.author: kris wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended to use in vehicle to plug in small electrics. Easy use right out of the box with good instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: The Bump

customer_reviews.title: The capacity in watts
customer_reviews.text: Is work very good I use in the ranch for the fan
customer_reviews.author: `ALEJANDRO

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for car trips to charge laptops, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for car trips to charge laptops, phones, etc. It was defective since it charged only the phones, using the USB. The actual plugs were not working, i returned it right away. I will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriana T.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: One of the usb ports broke after using it one time. Could have purchased a cheaper one that only had one usb port if that was my intent. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Oda Mae

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: Inverter works ok but quality of wires and battery clips is very flimsy and the plastic covering on metal clips is pretty much useless. Have had to search for the screwdown on the back for one of connecting wires a few times because it keeps coming loose
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: Ok so far just wish it had a way to mount it. Couldn't tell by pics on line. Haven't used it long enough to tell if it will hold up wish the meter showed amps also. The voltage out is useless info.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Won't power a 100 watt mini fridge. Can't handle start up current. Wish I had got a pure sine wave inverter. I'll keep in the car for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!!! Unit is worthless
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!!!! The first inverter I received was defective and I returned it the day after I received it. It was replaced with a unit that lasted 2 months. I don’t use it much and it was disheartening to turn it on and then the unit stops working. This item is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: lil3

customer_reviews.title: Great inverter
customer_reviews.text: The digital display is a great feature. It allows you to see actual voltage and current draw.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: It works. cheap build quality.
customer_reviews.text: It feels cheap. it is. but it works fine. It does auto shut off when voltage gets low. that level is a but higher than id like, as things can still run even on the lower voltage.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedingCheetah

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for our oxalic acid vaporizer for our bee hives (kills the varroa mite, the bane of beekeepers). Absolutely fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delighted with this inverter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with this inverter. I live off grid and am using this to power an AC electric fence charger to keep my yaks from crashing the fence. It works great. I especially like the display where I can see at a push of a button what my battery status is. Other small inverters were noisy and the fan would turn on as soon as power was delivered. Not so for this inverter. At least not at the power draw I am asking of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully on our boat. It was easy to use and was flawless. Well packaged and great material.
customer_reviews.author: Kandyfreak

customer_reviews.title: This is the best packaged item I have ever received
customer_reviews.text: This is the best packaged item I have ever received. They really care about protecting the product. As far as the inverter itself goes, it works flawlessly and even came with extra fuses!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: the 500w POTEK worked GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: After trying a 400w inverter from another company that didn,t work, the 500w POTEK worked GREAT !!!!!!! It powered my fog machine in less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: richard Kanehl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: works great in our camper, can run oscillating fan and charge my tablet at the same time all without running a noisy generator
customer_reviews.author: Karenb

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: great little inverter. I really like the size and watts used digital readout design. I burnt mine up by shorting a male plug I wired. Customer service was incredible, the best I have experienced online. They mailed me a replacement immediately.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item it’s a great addition to ant truck driver , it’s a most have
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Solhtalab

customer_reviews.title: Power your laptop at a rest stop
customer_reviews.text: When you absolutely must compose and send that vital email while you're on the road, and your laptop battery is dying, this is a perfect solution. My laptop only uses 12 watts, so there is almost no load on the inverter. Quiet, small, and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to inflate our 24 inch high air mattress. We use the cigarette lighter attachment and I can't rave about how much we love this. Also charged both our phones at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Modesto Mama

customer_reviews.title: great inverter
customer_reviews.text: This is the best inverter I've purchased, and when the lighter jack broke after some time of use, the Company sent me a replacement - they stand by their product and I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for charging my devices on the go. It feels sturdy and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Florencia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my brother. He loves it. Works better than his old one from Black and Decker, which shorted out like none other.
customer_reviews.author: Lycantis

customer_reviews.title: Weak performer
customer_reviews.text: This inverter is supposed to support up to 500 Watt loads but I was seeing it cut out at loads under 200 watts
customer_reviews.author: macmoon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with good clamps and digital read out. Comes with fuses but I haven’t had to change any.
customer_reviews.author: robot 33

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs
customer_reviews.text: The power inverter works very well put it on the road had a laptop on it that needed constant power battery does not work on the laptop also charge my smartphone at the same time plenty of power no problem
customer_reviews.author: Mark lee

customer_reviews.title: Quit and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet with clean 120v ac. I ran my saltwater aquarium with ian auto battery during a pge black out. It kept the pumps and lights going for a full day.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a road trip. It was quiet and kept several phones and tablets charged for a 10 hour ride. I would highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Functions as intended. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it almost every day, no complaints. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: WWolf

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product ran a fan and refrigerator for the Irma hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Bracetti

customer_reviews.title: Looks like pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it much yet just bought it to run my 32 inch tv.
customer_reviews.author: Dale H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: works great for powering work lap top while on location. excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Donna Creekmore

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for trunk or treat decorations
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for trunk or treat, tho I wish it had more plugins only used it once, so I can't say how durable.
customer_reviews.author: Beakybockers

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that this inverter was able to plug into the car or attach directly to a battery. The inverter is exceptional. using it to run two water pumps for 14 hours a day straight!
customer_reviews.author: Dyami Connell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for our pontoon so that we can charge our phones and blow up our floatie. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: MaPGreenDaughter

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the little extra $$$
customer_reviews.text: Got this to take on camping trips for blowing up air mattresses primarily but also to run a laptop and charge multiple devices as needed. It really does the job well and having the digital screen is a welcomed addition. The screen can tell you the current output so that you know if you are getting close to the maximum output. It's a rather helpful feature. This wasn't the cheapest option but it appeared to be of much higher quality. I am happy to report that it is indeed higher quality and is definitely worth the extra $$$
customer_reviews.author: Travis L. Rhone

customer_reviews.title: Digital readout
customer_reviews.text: Love the digital readout plus 2 outlets and 2 usb ports. Very convenient to charge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Well constructed. Will see how long this lasts. Has approx 10 hrs on it now and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Poison Sumac

customer_reviews.title: Powers tiny things or beeps constantly
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Put into a toyota rav 4 and seems to beep a lot, not stable. So i put it away. I guess it onky powers really tiny things.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Should be in every automotive roadside kit!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Gullick

customer_reviews.title: Lighter and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, specially when you need a reliable 110V outlet.
customer_reviews.author: César Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: ... inverters over the years and this one is the best I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had several power inverters over the years and this one is the best I've had so far. It's quiet, powerful. Great that it comes with interchangeable connectors for either battery or cigarette lighter. The digital power readout is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great device, I used it in the field during the solar eclipse. Kept everything charged and running.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M.

customer_reviews.title: Output is only 93 V
customer_reviews.text: I could get only 93 V when I connected it to my car's cigarette lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Okan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There couldn't have been a better choice for acomplishing the desired need!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Vert good Will make a sound when the battery is low ...
customer_reviews.text: Vert good Will make a sound when the battery is low to avoid over discharging it. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: PO Emond

customer_reviews.title: Potek 500 watt power invertor
customer_reviews.text: I use my invertor nearly every day. It has performed flawlessly. Now if only you can find a way to eliminate interference noise on the radio AM band.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, have had no issues so far and use every day.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works great, quiet, fan only runs as required not ALL the time. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Schmitzstorm

customer_reviews.title: This product does exactly what it is supposed to do ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is supposed to do and it is still working after few months. I'll write another review if it breaks within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L. Tirado-tirado

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well like the power out display. Only drawback is it wont come on by default. You have to switch out back on each time you start the car.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: The Max capacity when using it.
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot more capacity wise but it fail my expectations...
customer_reviews.author: Hector Felix Soto

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my unit, seems to work great.we use it at art shows to run our lights and a fan. Very quite and runs cool, no fan noise.much better than our old one
customer_reviews.author: jimmy holton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Remember to hook up to battery after certain watts of pull.
customer_reviews.author: F8

customer_reviews.title: Pontoon Life!
customer_reviews.text: used this for running a fan on my pontoon...works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it I like that it tells u the voltage and output
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok but seems to use more power than others l've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: T J Biz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The power output and the LCD display is great. Haven't found anything I dislike about it yet.
customer_reviews.author: SS1

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for power at my remote off grid camp. Used it 2 times, then the inverter stopped working (usb ports still worked). Sent Potek an email, they shipped me out a new one right away, no questions asked. I am testing out the new one before i bring it to my camp and its working fine. I like the features of this unit, particularly the display with input voltage, A/C output and how many watts the unit is drawing, and the fan doesn't run all the time. Its so affordable, I may buy another as a backup if this unit lasts. Thanks Potek for great customer service and for standing behind yor product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Alarm totally voids usability
customer_reviews.text: While the inverter does work, it has THE MOST annoying alarm. The alarm is going off 70% of the time and will not charge while the alarm is sounding. We purchased for use in the car during our long drives wanting my husband to be able to work while I drove. We even put the inverter in the trunk to deaden the sound of the alarm. But it was very frustrating that while the alarm was going off, we knew his laptop was not charging. So disappointed. He looked for another one to replace this one that will not have this same issue.
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Good until it blew up
customer_reviews.text: The inverter was good at first, mostly what you'd expect for $35 a good inverter that works at the rated wattage. It was a but annoying because if it's very small and high speed fan but at least it never overheated. The reason why I gave it two stars is because when I plugged it into my computer (750w pay but uses less than 200w) one of the mosfets inside blew up and let out a good but of smoke. I'm not sure if it had something to do with what kind of load the PC is but that is still unacceptable as 200w should be fine for a 500w inverter.

customer_reviews.title: its pretty good, I dont like the fact you gotta ...

customer_reviews.author: blbboys

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this inverter for a temporary replacement for my expensive off grid one that died. So far, it has preformed like a champ while being in constant use. The digital display is useful to monitor battery condition. The cooling fan only starts under heavy loads. During moderate use, the unit hardly warms up. I am happy I purchased this product. Mahalo!
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Ken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what I needed. There was a little issue with the one I ordered but the seller fixed the issue quickly and without hassle.

product_meta.title: POTEK 500W Power Inverter DC 12 V to 110V AC Car Converter with Digital Display Dual AC Outlets and Dual USB Charging Ports for Tablets, Laptop and Smartphones
feature_bullets: [500W Car Power Inverter with dual 110V AC outlets and 2 USB ports]: It provides 1000 Watt of peak power, dual USB ports can charge most phones and tablets simultaneously, while AC outlets ideal for charging laptop, breast pump, kindle, lights, iPad, etc

[Built-in Cooling Fan & Full Protection]: It has a cooling fan to keep the unit from over heating ( only works when output power over 200W, this ensures a quiet environment ). And along with all of the other safety protections in place, like the overload protection, short circuit and over/low battery
[Digital and illuminated display]: The digital display identifies the current status of the inverter, like INPUT (V), OUTPUT(V) and OUTPUT(W). While reading the number, a red LED light is displayed

[Ultra-protable and travel kit]: Just about 7.1 x 4.1 x 2.2 inches, space-saving, easy storage. extremely portable and lightweight at only 1.1 pounds. It's one of those things that is a must have especially in an emergency

[Cigarette lighter adapter and car battery clips are included for two options]: While you are driving, plug it into cigarette lighter, it can provide up to 150 watts of continuous power; When you're at a campground, you can connect it to the car battery directly, it will deliver up to 500 watts of continuous power.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars526 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
